classification.rationale: The role requires a strong background in Data Science/ML/Data Engineering and involves working with Spark and advanced proofs-of-concept. While Generative AI is mentioned, the core focus appears to be on broader data analytics, predictive modeling, and solution architecture rather than solely generative model development or LLM fine-tuning.
